Articles.Content: When launching a new vehicle, my camera always defaults to Auto: Orbital despite being on the ground. When I cycle through the camera modes and get back to Auto, it sometimes stays at Auto: Orbital and sometimes switches to Auto: Ground.

Same struggles. This didn't happen before as far as I remember.

Launches to Auto: Orbital, cannot look at a craft from horizontal (?) view, cycle through camera options and it still doesn't go to Auto: Ground for me.

Reverting to launch fixes it for that time.
as the title says the auto camera is not in the correct orientation with any vessel i use, whether its a plane or a rocket.
@LemonCrab Merged your bug report into this one.
